Remote Collections

Summary
Remote Collections
MQA.RemoteCollectionCreates a remote collection to process a remote data feed.
Functions
updateRefreshes the remote data feed.
getDataReturns the XML doc retrieved by the HTTPRequest or the JSON object returned by a script request.
setTimeoutDurationSets the script request timeout duration in milliseconds.
getTimeoutDurationGets the current timeout duration.
addEventListenersAdds the specified event listener to every object in the collection.
removeEventListenersRemoves the specified event listeners from every object in the collection.

MQA.RemoteCollection

Creates a remote collection to process a remote data feed.

Parameters

url(string) URL of the data feed.
deserializer(MQA.BaseDeserializer) Type of deserializer to use
timeoutDurationOptional Timeout duration in milliseconds for the data request.

Parameters

addEventListeners

Adds the specified event listener to every object in the collection.

Parameters

eventName(string) The event name to listen for.
handler(string) The callback function to use when the event fires.

Returns

n/a

See Also

removeEventListeners

removeEventListeners

Removes the specified event listeners from every object in the collection.

Parameters

eventName(string) Event name to clear listeners for.

Returns

n/a
